definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: roar (NH id.; Ar. 3a0’aja low, bleat, Frey);—

roar, of lion Ju Jdg 14:5 (c. [[לִקְרָאתוֹ]]), Am 3:4, Am 3:8, Ps 104:21 (c. [[ל]] of prey), fig. of invaders and foes Je 2:15 (c. [[עַל]] pers.) Ps 22:14, cf. Ps 74:4, sim. Is 5:29, Je 51:38; fig. of rapacious rulers Zep 3:3, Ez Eze 22:25 (read [[נְשִׂיאֶיהָ]] for [[נְבִיאֶתהָ]] LXX and mod.); of ´[[י]]: (like lion) calling scattered Isr. Ho 11:10, Ho 11:10 (on text of v. see Now); of ´[[י]]: roaring in thunder Je 25:30 a = Am 1:2 = Joe 3:16, also Je 25:30 ([[שָׁאׂג יִשְׁאַג]], sq. [[עַל־נׇוֵהוּ]]); cf. [[יִשְׁאַג־קוֹל]] Job 37:4 (‖[[יַָרְעֵם ]]).
of human cry in distress Ps 38:9 (c. [[מִן]] causat.).
